Slides container with overflow hidden and elevation

Responsive layout with different behaviors for mobile/desktop
Accessibility features including inert attribute for hidden slides

guidelines: Uses proper ARIA attributes including role='region' and aria-roledescription='carousel'
Progress indicator has aria-live='polite' for dynamic updates
Hidden slides use inert attribute to prevent focus
Interactive elements in hidden slides have tabindex='-1'
accessibility.aria_support: Comprehensive ARIA implementation for carousel accessibility

best_practices: Keep number of slides reasonable for performance
Ensure slide content is concise and scannable
Provide meaningful slide titles and content
Test responsive behavior across different screen sizes
technical_notes: JavaScript automatically initializes on page load
Handles font loading events for proper sizing
Uses CSS transforms for smooth animations
Responsive height adjustment based on content
Supports circular navigation (first to last, last to first)

notes: Component has stable status in source
Comprehensive JavaScript functionality with accessibility features
Complex responsive styling with animation support
Well-documented with clear prop definitions and examples
